inconsistencies: Time of incident differs across documents (2:30 PM in claimant statement, 3:45 PM in police report, 4:00 PM in medical report)
Accident description differs (claimant states hit on passenger side by car running red light, medical report states rear-ended while stopped at red light)
Weather conditions differ (claimant states clear and dry, police report indicates light rain)
Witness presence differs (claimant mentions pedestrian witness, police report states no witnesses recorded)
